lines.text: You are, how you say, the queer couple?
Odd couple, odd.
You slept with someone? Why didn't you tell me?
I just did.
Now you tell me? What good does it do me now?
What good is it SUPPOSED to do you?
You can't go.
I'll be back but I have to go first.
Do you miss me at all?
At all? Yes dear, I miss you at all.
They smiled. Maybe we should talk to them.
We can't. They're practically naked.
Try to picture them with clothes on.
That lady is my kind of guy. Don't wait up.
Make love to me.
I'm twenty years older than you.
Twenty-eight.
You are my twelfth lover in twelve days.
Really?
I don't hurt your feelings?
No, I've always been a team player.
Kiss you? I ought to spank you!
Oh, please, and bite me too.
Last night never happened.
I know. I was there when it didn't.
I'm no longer a carnivore. I don't eat anything that's ever had parents.
Do you hate me?
No, him. Does he tell you he loves you?
No.
You'll get used to it.
Poor Daddy!
Oh, yours or Nicole's?
Mine.
Oh, that poor daddy. You can't swing a dead cat around here without hitting a poor daddy.
That's not your lifeline, that's your heartline.
Teeny little thing, isn't it?
She's in love, you know?
She thinks so.
If you think so, you are.
What the hell are you doing, asking for her hand? "With this teething ring I thee wed"?
It was, quite simply, the worst night of my life, my embarrassment compounded by the fact that Victor had now slept with two out of the three members of my family.
Will you forget me?
The minute I die.
We've got a lot to talk about.
I know. I'm so glad you're leaving.
You only live once, but it does help if you get to be young twice.

One time a company I worked for transferred me to an island in the Pacific. Fantastic place. I invited my girl to visit me. I sent her a postcard everyday with a single word on each card. I wrote "Found a virgin paradise. It's yours. Matthew." Narturally, they were delivered in the wrong order. The message she got was "Found a virgin. It's paradise. Yours, Matthew." Never heard from her again.

[about their daughters]
They'll be all right. They're good girls.
Yeah. Let's go find some bad ones.
a one inch god with a two inch penis.
"Poor bastard", huh? If I ever get my hands on him, I'll beat him to death, that'll unconfuse him.
A beating is not the way, my friend.
He's right, you know?
Personally, I prefer torture.
